AI Description: libHaru is a free, open-source software library for generating PDF files. It supports a wide range of features for creating PDF documents programmatically, including text, images, vector graphics, and more.
Core Features: Generate Pdf Files Programmatically, Support For Text, Images, & Vector Graphics, Ability To Add Annotations & Bookmarks, Support For Encryption & Compression, Cross-Platform Compatibility
General Tags: Pdf Generation, Open-Source Software, Programming Library
